mapper.insert: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO Bg_Recent_product (user_id, product_id, viewed_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, datetime('now'))
mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.origin_name AS originName, p.content, p.price, p.image_url AS imageUrl, c.id AS cat_id, c.category_name AS cat_categoryName, c.parent_id AS cat_parentId, c.depth AS cat_depth, CASE WHEN w.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isWished FROM Bg_Recent_product rp LEFT JOIN Bg_Product p ON rp.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN Bg_Category_product_mapping cpm ON p.id = cpm.product_id LEFT JOIN Bg_Interest_category c ON cpm.interest_category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN Bg_Wishlist w ON p.id = w.product_id AND w.user_id = #{userId} WHERE rp.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY rp.viewed_at DESC LIMIT 20
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Bg_Recent_product WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
